DataElement.preferredDefinition: a yes/no indicator that asks whether the patient's disease is refractory to conventional therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: eligibilty criteria concerning treatment of the patient's cancer.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A disease is any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. Sometimes the term is used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function. (from Wikipedia)

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

ObjectClass.changeDescription: Updated to add EVS concept preferred name. dw

Property.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is patient's disease consider
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient's disease considered refractory to conventional therapy, or is there no existing effective conventional therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the cancer refractory to curative therapy or established treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the cancer refractory to curative therapy or established treatments?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received at least one prior therapy needs additional cytroreduction, and meets criteria for relapsed or refractory disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient relapsed or become refractory to conventional therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient disease refractory to prior lenalidomide

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient disease refractory to prior proteasome inhibitor-based therapy

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the patient enrolled because the patient was refractory to primary treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TEXT 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient refractory after 2 or more chemotherapy cycles?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient refractory after more than 2 attempts at induction therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient refractory after 2 or more attempts at induction therapy?

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Eligibility Ind-2 2018257v1 with VD ID#3506068 - Yes No Indicator - dbw
